What happens if I click "Accept all" on the UTN website?
By clicking "Accept all," you consent to data processing by the DAAD and third parties, which may not have the same level of data protection as EU law.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where can I manage my cookie preferences on the website?
You can adjust your cookie settings at any time under the "Cookies" section at the end of the page.
